meanings.sent1: The ahistoric painting had no old buildings or ancient stories.

meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see an ahistoric play set in medieval times.

meanings.definition: Not concerned with or related to history.
meanings.sent1: The ahistoric novel focused solely on the characters' present lives.
meanings.sent2: The company's decision to rebrand was ahistoric, ignoring its long history.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch an ahistoric debate about ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent4: Her ahistoric attitude towards tradition shocked her grandparents.
meanings.sent5: The ahistoric speech completely ignored the country's past struggles.
